project.name: Expenditure management app
project.description: Actually I was staying in rented house with my friends, there we were used to write expenditure on the things which will be used by all housemates on a notebook and on month end we were settling our expenditure. I found this as opportunity to apply my software knowledge, and started to build simple "Expenditure Management" web application using JDBC, J2EE technology and MySQL database. Features:  login/logout (used javax.servlet.http.HttpSession for implementing)  Verification and validation for registration and login form submission using JavaScript Tools used: Eclipse, Apache Tomcat web server, MySQL database.
